title: Mindsplitter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Split someone's mind, causing them to become 2 players. Both will get a new role. The first will have the same alignment as the original role, and the second will have the same subalignment as the original role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> The split player will be able to control both players.
> The person you split will keep their name for the first player, and get to pick a name for the second player.
> Split players can have different win cons, but can't have both a good faction win con and be part of an REF.
> People can only be split once.
> You cannot split yourself.
> You have a basic autovest.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: > Have 2 split players win the game.

desc:
Post 3622
*Don't ask me why splitting someone's mind creates a copy of them.*
